description: Airing on Tuesday, April 7, 2015: First up, more on news that FedExwill acquire TNT Express, a Dutch delivery company. Plus, we'll talk with Howard Schultz, CEO of Starbucks, about the company’s education initiative, Race Together, and activist CEOs.
teaser: Airing on Tuesday, April 7, 2015: First up, more on news that FedExwill acquire TNT Express, a Dutch delivery company. Plus, we'll talk with Howard Schultz, CEO of Starbucks, about the company’s education initiative, Race Together, and activist CEOs.

title: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday Apr. 7, 2015
